se.hig.exte.restcontroller

Class AcademyController

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.hig.exte.restcontroller.AcademyController

  • @RestController
 @RequestMapping(value="/academies")
public class AcademyController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is a RestController class responsible for mapping HTTP requests for the /academies path. It contains contains mappings of end-points to CrudServices that operate on Academy records in the database.

      Create a AcademyController object.

    • Method Detail

      • saveAcademy

        @PostMapping(value="/")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Academy> saveAcademy(@RequestBody
                                                                                             Academy academy)
        Creates an Academy and stores it in the database.
        Parameters:
        academy - The Academy to add in the form of a JSON-object in the POST request.
        Returns:
        A ResponseEntity object containing the saved Academy and an HTTP status code.

      • getAllAcademies

        @GetMapping(value="/all")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.util.List<Academy>> getAllAcademies()
        Fetches all Academy record from the database and returns them as a ResponseEntity object. List of Academy objects is automatically converted to JSON using Spring Boot's HttpMessageConverter and put in the ResponseEntity's body.
        Returns:
        A ResponseEntity object containing the fetched Academy objects.

      • getAcademy

        @GetMapping(value="/{id}")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Academy> getAcademy(@PathVariable
                                                                                               int id)

public void deleteAcademyById(@PathVariable

public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Academy> updateAcademy(@RequestBody
